item.description:
An all Ladies T-Dance on Saturday at Maddy’s Lounge. Dance to the sounds of D.J. Tracy to her R&B, Latin and Hip Hop music. D.J. Tracy has been mixing music for 20 years know.

As some of you know she has played at RCC, The PIED and Provincetown INN in P-town. She has also done special events like: Greater Boston Business Council, Weddings, Booze Cruise and Holiday Parties. She knows how to keep the people dancing.

So don't miss out on this great event as you know we normally get anywhere from 270 - 300 women.
Make sure yo get there early as you all know from previous events the parking lot gets full quickly and it's a BIG parking lot.

<<1st 50 people will receive a LOTTERY TICKET>>

((Ask about our SPECIAL DRINK of the month at a Discounted PRICE))

• Free Parking
• 21+, proper ID is required
• $7.00 Cover Charge
• Plenty of seating
• HUGE dance floor
• Food
• Fully stocked Bar
• KENO
• Pleasant lounge area (separate room)
Where
Maddy's Lounge
1639 Broadway
Saugus, MA, 01906
item.name: ALL LADIES T-DANCE
